X_data = rng.randn(N, 1)
_assert_changepoints_kern_err(X_data, kernels, locations, steepness)
pytest.mark.parametrize('N', [2, 10])pytest.mark.parametrize('kernels, locations, steepness', [[[gpflow.kernels.
    Constant(), gpflow.kernels.Constant()], [2.0], 5.0], [[gpflow.kernels.
    Constant(), gpflow.kernels.Constant(), gpflow.kernels.Constant()], [1.0,
    2.0], 5.0], [[gpflow.kernels.Constant(), gpflow.kernels.Constant(),
    gpflow.kernels.Constant()], [1.0, 2.0], [5.0, 10.0]], [[gpflow.kernels.
    Matern12(), gpflow.kernels.Linear(), gpflow.kernels.SquaredExponential(
    ), gpflow.kernels.Constant()], [1.0, 2.0, 3.0], 5.0]])
